# 数字巨链

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shuzi-julian
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shuzi-julian
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shuzi-julian
shuzi-julian <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shuzi-julian
shuzi-julian <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
